author: jonl
msg: Fixed a bug where IConvertible/IConverterSource were referenced by the model in a non-transient way.  The solution was to simply delete the code, which is my favorite thing to do with code!

author: jonl
msg: Made AttributeModifiers more space efficient by eliminating ArrayList.  Fixed bug in Session introduced recently by changing id from Integer to String as key in session page map.

author: jonl
msg: Changed Component.name property to Component.id to match upcoming changes.

author: jonl
msg: Added ApplicationSettings property defaultLocale for companies that have machines running multiple different languages and prefer to set the default locale to something other than the OS's default locale.  Changed Session.java to use this property when creating a new session.
